title: About the Artist – Robin Custance
content:
Hello, I'm Robin Custance—an Aboriginal Australian artist, part-time Kangaroo whisperer, and lifelong storyteller through color, line, and imagination. My artistic journey began on Kaurna Country in Adelaide, with roots reaching back to the Naracoorte region (Boandik Country).

Each piece I create—be it dot painting, digital design, or contemporary Australian landscape—honors Country, community, and the vibrant narratives passed down through generations.

Regardless of the style or subject, my aim as an artist is to tell stories and evoke genuine emotion. Whether using ancient dot techniques, digital brushes, or bold modern colors, I infuse heart and meaning into every creation.

My art serves to give back and strengthen culture, blending the timeless with the modern, and weaving my heritage with today's creative spirit. By bringing my art into your home, you welcome a piece of Australian story and soul, crafted with passion and character.
